steps.details: Advise residents to stay indoors, close windows, and use masks; warn vulnerable groups particularly.
Environment dept to dispatch inspectors to suspected facilities for stack malfunction checks.
Suspend outdoor school activities and halt outdoor construction in affected zones.
Prepare mask distribution for exposed workers and inform clinics to expect respiratory upticks.
Run dispersion models to forecast affected downwind neighborhoods and adjust advisories.
School authorities to keep students indoors and halt outdoor sports until AQI normalizes.
Public health to establish helpline and triage centers for respiratory distress reports.
Issue temporary operational restrictions to identified polluters until investigations complete.
Encourage ventilation controls on buses and provide masks at major stops.
Publish hourly AQI readings and targeted advisories to affected neighborhoods.

plan.plan_title: Distribution & Logistics Clog on Tumkur Road

steps.details: Keep service lanes clear for medical vehicles by enforcing no-parking and staged removal of distribution vans.
Coordinate mask and aid distribution schedules to avoid crowding that blocks service lanes.
Marshals to manage queues and maintain flow for emergency services.
Redirect bus routes away from heavily clogged service lanes to maintain network reliability.
Record delays and impediments for post-incident analysis and resource optimization.
